headings.usage: Use for all page titles, section headers, and card titles.

body.usage: Use for all paragraph text, inputs, and data tables.

mono.usage: Use for specific data points like IDs or code snippets if any.

palettes.friend: Warmer/Softer accents allowed, but keeping to the Blue/Slate system

inputs.style: flex h-10 w-full rounded-md border border-input bg-background px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-background file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

login_page.left_panel: Form container, centered vertically, spacious padding (p-8 md:p-12)
login_page.right_panel: Image cover (hidden on mobile), abstract office minimal image

job_board.structure: Single column vertical list for jobs, but use Grid for filters/header
job_board.card_style: Row layout on desktop (Company Logo | Role Info | Tags | Apply Button), Stacked on mobile
job_board.masonry_alternative: Use simple vertical stack with gap-4 for readability

leaderboard.structure: Top section: 'Podium' style for Top 3 (Gold/Silver/Bronze highlight rings). Below: Table/List for rest.
leaderboard.visuals: Use minimal avatars or initials if no image. Progress bars for visual score comparison.

admin_dashboard.structure: Sidebar or Topbar navigation. Dense data grid for User Management and Job Management.
admin_dashboard.visuals: Clean tables with Shadcn Table component. Row actions (Edit/Delete) in a dropdown menu.

general: Ensure Dark Mode is implemented via 'dark' class on HTML element (handled by theme toggle).
testing: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, links).

universal_guidelines: Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Every interaction needs micro-animations (hover, focus, active).
Never use default browser scrollbars; customize or hide if possible.
Input fields should have clear focus rings.
Empty states must be designed (don't just show nothing, show a helpful message + icon).
